mapper.sql: ${tableAlias}description AS ${fieldAlias}description, ${tableAlias}name AS ${fieldAlias}name, ${tableAlias}ordinal AS ${fieldAlias}ordinal, ${tableAlias}label_start_date AS ${fieldAlias}label_start_date, ${tableAlias}label_end_date AS ${fieldAlias}label_end_date, ${tableAlias}label_protocol_number AS ${fieldAlias}label_protocol_number
